title: Bass Boost
description: Enhance low frequencies for deeper, richer sound
pageDescription: Enhance low frequencies for deeper, richer sound
aboutDescription: Bass boost enhances low-frequency content (typically 20-250Hz) to add warmth, power, and depth to your audio. Perfect for music, podcasts, and sound design.

sections.title: Bass Frequency Ranges
content: Sub-bass (20-60Hz): Deep rumble, felt more than heard

sections.title: When to Use Bass Boost
content: Music with weak or thin bass response
Podcasts and voice recordings lacking warmth
Audio played on small speakers or headphones
Sound design for impact and power

sections.title: Bass Boost Tips
content: Start with small amounts (3-6dB) and adjust to taste
Be careful not to muddy the mix with too much boost
Consider the playback system - some have natural bass emphasis
Use high-pass filtering to remove unwanted sub-sonic content
Monitor on different speakers to check translation
